an6.13:1.4: ‘metta hi kho me cetovimutti bhavita bahulikata yanikata vatthukata anutthita paricita susamaraddha;
an6.13:1.5: atha ca pana me byapado cittam pariyadaya titthati’ti.
an6.13:1.6: So ‘ma hevan’tissa vacaniyo: ‘mayasma evam avaca; ma bhagavantam abbhacikkhi, na hi sadhu bhagavato abbhakkhanam, na hi bhagava evam vadeyya.
an6.13:1.7: Atthanametam, avuso, anavakaso yam mettaya cetovimuttiya bhavitaya bahulikataya yanikataya vatthukataya anutthitaya paricitaya susamaraddhaya;
an6.13:1.8: atha ca panassa byapado cittam pariyadaya thassati, netam thanam vijjati.
an6.13:2.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evam vadeyya:
an6.13:2.2: ‘karuna hi kho me cetovimutti bhavita bahulikata yanikata vatthukata anutthita paricita susamaraddha;
an6.13:2.3: atha ca pana me vihesa cittam pariyadaya titthati’ti.
an6.13:2.4: So ‘ma hevan’tissa vacaniyo: ‘mayasma evam avaca; ma bhagavantam abbhacikkhi, na hi sadhu bhagavato abbhakkhanam, na hi bhagava evam vadeyya.
an6.13:2.5: Atthanametam, avuso, anavakaso yam karunaya cetovimuttiya bhavitaya bahulikataya yanikataya vatthukataya anutthitaya paricitaya susamaraddhaya;
an6.13:2.6: atha ca panassa vihesa cittam pariyadaya thassati, netam thanam vijjati.
an6.13:3.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evam vadeyya:
an6.13:3.2: ‘mudita hi kho me cetovimutti bhavita bahulikata yanikata vatthukata anutthita paricita susamaraddha;
an6.13:3.3: atha ca pana me arati cittam pariyadaya titthati’ti.
an6.13:3.4: So ‘ma hevan’tissa vacaniyo: ‘mayasma evam avaca; ma bhagavantam abbhacikkhi, na hi sadhu bhagavato abbhakkhanam, na hi bhagava evam vadeyya.
an6.13:3.5: Atthanametam, avuso, anavakaso yam muditaya cetovimuttiya bhavitaya bahulikataya yanikataya vatthukataya anutthitaya paricitaya susamaraddhaya;
an6.13:3.6: atha ca panassa arati cittam pariyadaya thassati, netam thanam vijjati.
an6.13:4.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evam vadeyya:
an6.13:4.2: ‘upekkha hi kho me cetovimutti bhavita bahulikata yanikata vatthukata anutthita paricita susamaraddha;
an6.13:4.3: atha ca pana me rago cittam pariyadaya titthati’ti.
an6.13:4.4: So ‘ma hevan’tissa vacaniyo: ‘mayasma evam avaca; ma bhagavantam abbhacikkhi, na hi sadhu bhagavato abbhakkhanam, na hi bhagava evam vadeyya.
an6.13:4.5: Atthanametam, avuso, anavakaso yam upekkhaya cetovimuttiya bhavitaya bahulikataya yanikataya vatthukataya anutthitaya paricitaya susamaraddhaya;
an6.13:4.6: atha ca panassa rago cittam pariyadaya thassati, netam thanam vijjati.
an6.13:5.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evam vadeyya:
an6.13:5.2: ‘animitta hi kho me cetovimutti bhavita bahulikata yanikata vatthukata anutthita paricita susamaraddha;
an6.13:5.3: atha ca pana me nimittanusari vinnanam hoti’ti.
an6.13:5.4: So ‘ma hevan’tissa vacaniyo: ‘mayasma evam avaca; ma bhagavantam abbhacikkhi, na hi sadhu bhagavato abbhakkhanam, na hi bhagava evam vadeyya.
an6.13:5.5: Atthanametam, avuso, anavakaso yam animittaya cetovimuttiya bhavitaya bahulikataya yanikataya vatthukataya anutthitaya paricitaya susamaraddhaya;
an6.13:5.6: atha ca panassa nimittanusari vinnanam bhavissati, netam thanam vijjati.
an6.13:6.1: Idha pana bhikkhave, bhikkhu evam vadeyya:
an6.13:6.2: ‘asmiti kho me vigatam, ayamahamasmiti ca na samanupassami;
an6.13:6.3: atha ca pana me vicikicchakathankathasallam cittam pariyadaya titthati’ti.
an6.13:6.4: So ‘ma hevan’tissa vacaniyo: ‘mayasma evam avaca; ma bhagavantam abbhacikkhi, na hi sadhu bhagavato abbhakkhanam, na hi bhagava evam vadeyya.
an6.13:6.5: Atthanametam, avuso, anavakaso yam asmiti vigate ayamahamasmiti ca na samanupassato;
an6.13:6.6: atha ca panassa vicikicchakathankathasallam cittam pariyadaya thassati, netam thanam vijjati.
an6.13:6.7: Nissarananhetam, avuso, vicikicchakathankathasallassa yadidam asmiti manasamugghato’ti.
an6.13:7.1: Ima kho, bhikkhave, cha nissaraniya dhatuyo”ti.
